# alarms

**Instance Property**

The alarms associated with the calendar item, as an array of [doc://com.apple.eventkit/documentation/EventKit/EKAlarm] objects.

## Declaration

```swift
var alarms: [EKAlarm]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is `nil` if the calendar item has no alarms.

## Adding and Removing Alarms

- **hasAlarms**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the calendar item has alarms.
- **addAlarm(_:)**: Adds an alarm to the receiver.
- **removeAlarm(_:)**: Removes an alarm from the calendar item.
